interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Savanaahs Organic Argan Oil 4 Oz / 120 ML 100% Pure & Cold Pressed - Premium Grade - USDA Certified Organic - Large 4 Oz Glass Bottle - Excellent Natural Multi-Purpose Moisturizer for Skin, Hair & Nails - Non-Greasy and Fast Absorbing - Good Source of Vitamin E & Omegas - Rejuvenates Dry Skin - 100% Satisfaction Guarantee - 90 Days Full Refund/ Return Policy (No Questions Asked) - New Design & Packaging - Promotional Price for Limited Time Only Review Date: 2014/04/05 Store: LPVLUX Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 4.8 x 2.3 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '4 OZ / 120 ML', 'UPC': '661799831734 885133330916', 'Manufacturer': 'Divine Organics'} Review Text: I’ve tried other brands of argan oil, and have been surprised that some of the brands almost seem more like canola oil or a neutral oil, to where I almost wondered if some of them are counterfeit. Not so with this brand. This brand has the natural scent of the real deal, and is effective to boot. I have a baby, so have been washing my hands about 10 times a day, every time I change his diaper. Between that and all of the diaper wipes I use, my hands have been starting to peel and crack, so I knew I needed a solution.

This argan oil came with a regular lid, an eyedropper, and a pump dispenser. I used the pump dispenser and set it right next to my faucet so I could get a quick pump of oil every time I wash my hands. Well, it only took a couple of days to experience really great results. My hands feel normal again, and I am so relieved. From hard skin that was rough and crackled, to soft, happy hands again.

I have also used the product on my split ends, and here, I’d like to caution you that only a few drops are needed. It is very effective and soaks and well, so you only need a very small amount.

Overall, this argan oil is one of the best I have found. It comes packaged beautifully and looks like a gift, has multiple options for how you dispense it, and is pure, organic, and has the mild scent of real argan oil, unlike some competitors. Review Title: A fantastic product at a fantastic price Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Not so with this brand. This brand has the natural scent of the real deal, and is effective to boot. I have a baby, so have been washing my hands about 10 times a day, every time I change his diaper. profile: The user demonstrates a strong preference for high-quality, organic skincare products that effectively address specific needs, particularly for skin repair and moisture retention. They favor products that come with versatile packaging options, allowing for ease of use in everyday situations, such as a home with a baby. The user values authenticity in natural products, as seen in their comparison of this argan oil to others they have tried, indicating skepticism towards products that lack genuine characteristics. Their experience highlights a focus on functionality, with a particular reliance on moisturizers for dry skin and hair care, along with a sensitivity to scent, preferring products with mild, natural aromas. The user's positive feedback and ratings reflect an appreciation for both product quality and value for money, often expecting effective results within a short timeframe. Overall, the user prioritizes organic authenticity, functional design, and effective performance in their skincare choices.
